name: LighthouseKIdz-BCCMemoryVerse
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
I know of no other single practice in the Christian life more rewarding, practically speaking, than memorizing Scripture. . . . No other single exercise pays greater spiritual dividends.

This flash briefing contains the weekly memory verse from Lighthouse Kidz Ministry Burrell Community Church in Lower Burrell, PA.

Join us Sunday mornings at 9:00 am and 11:00 AM and Wednesday evenings at 7:00 PM.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
